item.text: Just before the Passover Feast, Jesus knew that his time had come to depart from this world to the Father. Having loved his own who were in the world, he now loved them to the very end.

The <st data-num="1173">evening meal</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1096">was in progress</st>, and the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st> had <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="906" class="">put</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="2455" class="">Judas</st> <st data-num="2469" class="">Iscariot</st>, <st data-num="4613">Simon’s</st> son, <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> he should <st data-num="3860" class="">betray</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st>.<n id="4" />

Because Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">knew</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> had <st data-num="1325" class="">handed</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">all things</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">over</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he had <st data-num="1831" class="">come</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="5217">going back</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,

he <st data-num="1453">got up</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="1173" class="">meal</st>, <st data-num="5087" class="">removed</st><n id="1" /> his <st data-num="2440">outer clothes</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> a <st data-num="3012" class="">towel</st> and <st data-num="1241" class="">tied</st> it <st data-num="1241" class="">around</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>.<n id="3" />
He poured water into the washbasin and began to wash the disciples’ feet and to dry them with the towel he had wrapped around himself.
Then he came to Simon Peter. Peter said to him, “Lord, are you going to wash my feet?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="4771">You</st> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492">understand</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="737" class="">now</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> you will <st data-num="1097" class="">understand</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st>.”

<st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “You will <st data-num="3756 3361">never</st> <st data-num="3538" class="">wash</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>!”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="1437">If</st> I do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3538" class="">wash</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="3313" class="">share</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, wash<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3441">only</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> my <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> my <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st>!”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “The one who has <st data-num="3068" class="">bathed</st> <st data-num="2192 5532">needs</st> <st data-num="1487 3361">only</st> to <st data-num="3538" class="">wash</st> his <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">completely</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2513" class="">clean</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> disciples<n id="5" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2513" class="">clean</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> one of you.”
(For Jesus knew the one who was going to betray him. For this reason he said, “Not every one of you is clean.”)
So when Jesus had washed their feet and put his outer clothing back on, he took his place at the table again and said to them, “Do you understand what I have done for you?

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="5455" class="">call</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> ‘<st data-num="1320" class="">Teacher</st>’ <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> ‘<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>,’ <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">do so</st> <st data-num="2573" class="">correctly</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> that is what I <st data-num="1510">am</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st>, your <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1320" class="">Teacher</st>, have <st data-num="3538" class="">washed</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st> <st data-num="3784" class="">ought to</st> <st data-num="3538" class="">wash</st> <st data-num="240">one another’s</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I have <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> an <st data-num="5262" class="">example</st><n id="1" />—<st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> should <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="4160" class="">done</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">solemn</st> <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3173">greater</st> than <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st>, <st data-num="3761" class="">nor</st> is the one who is sent as a <st data-num="652">messenger</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3173">greater</st> than the one who <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
If you understand these things, you will be blessed if you do them.
“What I am saying does not refer to all of you. I know the ones I have chosen. But this is to fulfill the scripture, ‘The one who eats my bread has turned against me.’

I am <st data-num="3004" class="">telling</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> this <st data-num="737" class="">now</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> it <st data-num="1096" class="">happens</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> it <st data-num="1096" class="">happens</st> you may <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> he.<n id="3" />
I tell you the solemn truth, whoever accepts the one I send accepts me, and whoever accepts me accepts the one who sent me.”
When he had said these things, Jesus was greatly distressed in spirit, and testified, “I tell you the solemn truth, one of you will betray me.”

The <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> began to <st data-num="991" class="">look</st> <st data-num="1519">at</st> <st data-num="240" class="">one another</st>, <st data-num="639">worried and perplexed</st><n id="1" /> to know <st data-num="5101">which</st> of them he was <st data-num="3004" class="">talking</st> about.

<st data-num="1520" class="">One</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">the one</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="25" class="">loved</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="345">at the table<n id="2" /> to the right</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="2859">place of honor</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3506" class="">gestured</st> to <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> disciple<n id="2" /> to <st data-num="4441">ask</st> Jesus<n id="3" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> he was <st data-num="3004">referring to</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="3767">Then</st> the disciple whom Jesus loved<n id="1" /> <st data-num="377">leaned back</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus’</st> <st data-num="4738" class="">chest</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> it?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1565">It</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the one to <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> this <st data-num="5596" class="">piece of bread</st><n id="2" /> after I have <st data-num="911" class="">dipped</st> it in the dish.”<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="911" class="">dipped</st> the <st data-num="5596" class="">piece of bread</st> in the dish<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> it to <st data-num="2455" class="">Judas</st> <st data-num="2469" class="">Iscariot</st>, <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon’s</st> son.

<st data-num="2532">And</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> Judas<n id="1" /> took the <st data-num="5596">piece of bread</st>, <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="1565">him</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="3" /> “<st data-num="3739">What</st> you are about to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st>, <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="5036">quickly</st>.”

(<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">none</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">those</st> <st data-num="345">present at the table</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1097" class="">understood</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> Jesus<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> this to <st data-num="846" class="">Judas</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="5100" class="">Some</st> <st data-num="1380" class="">thought</st> that <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="2455" class="">Judas</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> the <st data-num="1101">money box</st>, <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> was <st data-num="3004" class="">telling</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to <st data-num="59" class="">buy</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whatever</st> they <st data-num="5532 2192">needed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="1859" class="">feast</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">something</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="4434">poor</st>.)<n id="2" />
Judas took the piece of bread and went out immediately. (Now it was night.)
When Judas had gone out, Jesus said, “Now the Son of Man is glorified, and God is glorified in him.

<st data-num="1487">If</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> is <st data-num="1392" class="">glorified</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> will <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1392" class="">glorify</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he will <st data-num="1392" class="">glorify</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2117">right away</st>.<n id="2" />
Children, I am still with you for a little while. You will look for me, and just as I said to the Jewish religious leaders, ‘Where I am going you cannot come,’ now I tell you the same.
“I give you a new commandment—to love one another. Just as I have loved you, you also are to love one another.
Everyone will know by this that you are my disciples—if you have love for one another.”
Simon Peter said to him, “Lord, where are you going?” Jesus replied, “Where I am going, you cannot follow me now, but you will follow later.”

<st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> <st data-num="3756 1410">can’t</st> I <st data-num="190" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="737" class="">now</st>? I will <st data-num="5087">lay down</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>!”<n id="1" />
Jesus answered, “Will you lay down your life for me? I tell you the solemn truth, the rooster will not crow until you have denied me three times!
